name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shortcut on Browser Address Bar Omnibox

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Start search directly and navigate to favorite websites easily from address bar (omnibox) with shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension helps you to search on favorite search engines directly and navigate websites easily from address bar (omnibox)

After the extension installed, press ". " (dot + space) and type text to view suggestions.

Features:
- Start search directly from address bar on favorite search engines. (Google, Bing, Yandex, Wikipedia, Youtube Music, Spotify etc.)
- Filter suggestions by typing -TAG_NAME on address bar.
- Add new websites or search engines to use them on addressbar.
- Suggestions will be sorted according to your most used suggestions.
- 60 pre-defined suggestions and all of them is enabled but you can disable suggestions that you don't want to use.
